Player History
Had first career hit on 5/26/1968, off Tug McGraw (CHC)...
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Texas in 1971...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 6/3/1972 (Going to TEX: 1B H. Killebrew. Going to CLE: P J. Bethke, 2B P. Garner, LF A. Mora)...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 7/21/1978 (Going to TEX: LF A. Mora, P L. Straker. Going to CLE: RF J. Wynn)...
Injured on 9/6/1981 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Texas on 8/22/1983...
Drafted in 4th round, 67th overall pick, by California in 1987...
Injured on 4/29/1987 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/12/1987 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Injured on 4/8/1993 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Injured on 6/4/1996 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
